law.text:
If one of the purposes of the solicitation or attempted solicitation is to change the racial composition of a neighborhood, a person may not solicit or attempt to solicit the listing of residential properties for sale or lease by:
in person door-to-door solicitation;
telephone solicitation; or
mass distribution of circulars.
